class_c_03_history_01:
Greetings, my little students. Whatever you did
yesterday, it is now a part of history.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_02:
Today, we will continue to unravel the marvels
that history has presented to us.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_03:
As you should remember from our last class,
Area Zero’s Great Era of Exploration began\r
about two thousand years ago.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_04:
This era lasted for approximately one thousand
years, but not a single soul was able to venture\r
all the way to the deepest reaches of Area Zero.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_05:
Having poured much of its human and financial
resources into the exploration of Area Zero for\r
so long, the Paldean Empire fell into decline.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_06:
Two hundred years later—or eight hundred years
ago—the empire and its surrounding nations\r
united into one entity.\c
This was the formation of Paldea as we know it
today.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_07:
Ah yes, this very academy where you’re now
filling your young minds with knowledge was also\r
apparently established at that time.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_08:
In fact, this school building—though certainly
having undergone repairs through the years—\r
is just as it was when it was built so long ago.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_09:
This very structure is a piece of history! Ahh!
Things of old are truly splendid![VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_10:
I would certainly prefer it not to have the Poké
Ball portion, though—a relatively new addition.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_11:
Aha. Perfect timing to make eye contact, young
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_12:
Let’s see if you’ve been listening to my lecture.\c
Tell me—approximately how many years ago
was this academy of ours established?[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_answer_01:
Incorrect! You are missing two hundred years of
splendid history![VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_answer_02:
Incorrect! You are missing one hundred years of
splendid history![VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_answer_03:
Correct! I see the look of concentration on your
face was indeed just that.\c
I hate nothing more than when a student only
pretends to listen.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_13:
This academy was constructed exactly 805 years
ago, to be precise. In other words, your academy\r
here is 805 years old![VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_14:
At the time, it offered state-of-the-art facilities
and a uniquely innovative curriculum. As such,\r
people used to say...[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_15a:
“Those seeking knowledge need look no further
than the oranges of Paldea.”\c
That’s right—they were referring to Naranja
Academy![VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_15b:
“Those seeking knowledge need look no further
than the grapes of Paldea.”\c
That’s right—they were referring to Uva
Academy![VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_16:
It is said that this proverb of sorts was even used
outside of the Paldea region.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_17:
Oho, is that the time already? I must’ve gotten
swept up in filling your minds with knowledge.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_03_history_18:
This ends today’s lesson. Our next class will be
our midterm exam.\c
Bring the wonders of history to the forefront of
your minds in preparation.[VAR 0114(0027)]
